mapper.select: SELECT IDX , NAME , TYPE , VALUE FROM MAJOR
SELECT IDX , NAME , TYPE , VALUE , ALL_TYPE_NAME FROM LECTURE WHERE VALUE = #{value }
SELECT INPUT_NAME , INPUT_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE SUBJECTS = #{value } AND LEVEL ='PRO'

SELECT A.NO AS USER_NO , A.INPUT_NAME AS USER_NM , A.INPUT_SCHOOL , A.INPUT_ID AS USER_ID , A.INPUT_MAJOR , A.USER_PW , A.LEVEL AS USER_LEVEL , A.REG_DATE , A.SUBJECTS , B.FULL_NAME FROM MEMBER A JOIN USER_ADD_FILE B ON A.NO = B.NO WHERE A.INPUT_ID = #{value }
